name: Burley Coho XC Trailer
description: Planning to ride a section of the Trans Canada Trail or bikepack Quebec's Eastern Townships? Tow your gear on a sturdy cargo trailer. The Coho XC's frame and suspension take bumpy roads for granted, while the wheel has strong steel spokes and comes with an off-road tire. The fork and yoke fit a wide range of wheel sizes (even fat tires!), so you can take a break and let your riding buddy tow the trailer for a bit. Panniers fit on the rear fender, and water bottles and a pump can be mounted on the frame. After your adventure, the trailer disassembles for easy storage without the need for tools.Rugged aluminum frame.Coil-sprung suspension is suitable for use on rough roads and singletrack.16in. wheel is steel-spoked and includes a 2.125in. tire for off-road use.The fork accommodates a fat 3in. tire (sold separately) for unpredictable surfaces and adventures deep into the wild.Innovative yoke accomodates a huge range of wheel and hub sizes, including 26in., 700c, 650b/27.7in., 27.5in. plus, 29in. and fat wheels, and hubs ranging from 126mm to 197mm.One-hand release lever and height-adjustable kickstand allow for easy unloading on a variety of surfaces and inclines.Rear fender accepts panniers (not included) and is level with the main frame, allowing you to transport long and oversized items like shovels and paddles on top.Frame tubing sports accessory mounts for water bottles, pumps and other accessories.Flag mount doubles as a bottle opener.Disassembles tool-free for compact storage.Burley Ballz Axle is required for use (sold separately).Cargo volume is 70L.Towing capacity is 31.8kg (70lb.).
